sentences: Brandi Disterheft (born 1980) is a Canadian bassist and composer.
Born in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, Disterheft grew up in the District of North Vancouver, British Columbia where she attended Handsworth Secondary School.
Upon graduation, she won scholarship to attend Humber College in Toronto, Ontario where she studied under Don Thompson.
Pleased To Meet You - Hank Jones and Oliver Jones (pianist) (Justin Time, 2009)
